    • Field Detail

      • OK

        public static final int OK
        This class defines valid messages that can be sent over a network. The messages are of different types and each type is identified by one of the types.
        See Also:

      • sourceId

        private int sourceId
        sourceId is the origin of the message, sourcePort is the port from which the message was sent destinationId is the target process data is a list of data items that the process likes to send
